CHAT.comment: Freeplay. Mother and Child sit on floor playing with box of experimenter provided toys. First they play with magnetic chalkboard and pieces; then with puppets. Child is quite intelligible.

u.a: puts toy down; takes out box of chalk .
tries to take a piece out .
begins to remove magnets from box and place on board .
tries a piece on the back of the board .
looks at box , looks at camera person .
has been fidgety and inattentive for several turns .
Mother doesn't realize that Child addressed puppet .
to puppet , tries to put chalk in puppet's mouth .
